```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(gisland)
```

What is on the menu?:

```{r}
gl_lmi_features() |> 
  select(-title) |> 
  kableExtra::kbl(full_width = F) |>
  kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```

Lets get one dish:

```{r}
gl <- 
  read_lmi("LHG:grunnlina")
glimpse(gl)
# MULTICURVE is an odd geom, thus ...
gl <-
  gl |> 
  sf::st_cast("MULTILINESTRING")
gl |> 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf()
```

Or rivers

```{r}
#| eval: false
library(mapview)
rivers <- 
  read_lmi("IS_50V:vatnafar_linur")
rivers <-
  rivers |> 
  sf::st_cast("MULTILINESTRING")
mapview(rivers)
```
